document.full_text: a climber with a broken leg was rescued from a snowy spot 800 feet below the summit of mount mckinley, while one of his expedition partners was found dead farther down the mountain, the national park service said on friday.
document.title: injured man rescued near summit of alaska's mount mckinley
lines_and_colors: a climber with a broken leg was rescued from a snowy spot 800 feet below the summit of mount mckinley, while one of his expedition partners was found dead farther down the mountain, the national park service said on friday.
